sourcesContent:
import './App.css'; function AboutMe() { return (

About Me

Ben Smith (He/him)

I am a freelance theatre sound engineer based in SE London, working as a sound operator for musicals and plays: I have worked on Regional productions, National and International Tours, and in the West End. I am confident mixing musicals, including working with actor-musicians, click-tracks, and in large venues, as well as looking after backstage as a Sound No. 2.

I also have experience in sound design for theatrical productions, concerts and live events.

{/*

I always strive to be adaptable, to take challenges in my stride and work with the entire production team to create the best possible result.

*/}

Recently, I have spent this period of lockdown honing my computer skills, and have refined my collection of scripts for Figure 53's Qlab, as well as created a few simple scripts to make working with Reaper easier in a live theatre environment. I also learnt some simple web development for one-page sites such as this one!

I am available for work on recordings and broadcast events, especially while live theatre is not an option for many venues and creatives. Whether itâ€™s editing and cleaning up recordings from zoom, mixing a performance remotely or as a livestream, or a creative sound design for a digital production, I would love to help present your content to a wider audience.

); } export default AboutMe;
